product_name: Eagle Creek Tarmac All Wheel Drive Wheeled Luggage - 22"
long_description: The Eagle Creek Tarmac All Wheel Drive 22 carry on provides weightless in-hand carry with 4 wheels, built-in durability and convenient travel features. 4 multidirectional wheels offer 360deg maneuverability and produce zero weight-in-hand when rolling upright. Expandable capacity offers extra space for the trip home; please note that when expanded, the luggage no longer qualifies as carry on size. Tarmac AWD is made from rugged Bi-Tech(TM) fabrics for extreme abrasion and weather resistance, and a 3-ply polycarbonate back for superior impact resistance. Includes rugged wheels with sturdy wheel housing, a skid plate, bumper protection and a travel-tested handle system. Large padded exterior zip pocket fits most 15 in. laptops; includes a padded sleeve that fits most tablets. Quick-grab lockable top pocket contains a coat keeper for attaching your jacket, a key fob with bottle opener and an attached piggyback clip to securely attach another bag. Main pocket features a zippered cargo net that supplies compression when used inside; or attach it to the outside of the bag for use as a utility net. Large interior zip mesh pocket. #10 lockable zippers secure main compartment and have finger-friendly zipper pulls; luggage locks are sold separately. 2 exterior compression straps help stabilize and secure luggage contents. Reflective accents improve dusk and nighttime visibility. Integrates with Eagle Creek Pack-It(R) Systems, sold separately.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Tarmac All Wheel Drive 22 carry on provides weightless in-hand carry with 4 wheels, built-in durability and convenient travel features.
